attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to say it's time for change. This goverment has no ideas and is hopelessly lost. Get Gordon out!If you would like to support me on this please vote now!

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. The title of your petition is currently your own name so cannot be accepted.

There is also an existing petition calling on the PM to resign: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/please-go/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
